amendment.description: Relating to the comprehensive review of the procedures of the Department of Defense on mortuary affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4228 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4228 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6384-6385) Relating to the comprehensive review of the procedures of the Department of Defense on mortuary affairs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4228 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4228 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
